text: Bahawalpur District () is a district in the Punjab province of Pakistan. The city of Bahawalpur is the capital. The Riasti dialect of the Saraiki language is spoken here, and the neighboring areas in the Bahawalpur area of Cholistan. ==Administration== The district is administratively divided into five tehsils and 107 Union Councils: * Ahmedpur Sharqia Tehsil * Bahawalpur Tehsil City * Hasilpur Tehsil * Khairpur Tamewali Tehsil * Yazman Mandi Tehsil * Bahawalpur Tehsil Sadar Category:Bahawalpur Division
title: Bahawalpur District
